title: LIVESTREAM - GRAND FINAL Oceania Preseason Tournmanet
body:
#Watch North eSports battle it out against Enclave Black in Oceania's Preseason Tournament!
http://www.twitch.tv/pacificpeninsula
-------
**Twitch chat is hosting an exclusive give away!**
**Tune in to enter!**
Grand Final Give away!
Who will win? North eSports OR Enclave Black
Enter by PMing me on Twitch who you think will take the cup! If you selected the correct team, you maybe chosen in a random draw to receive 2x Mystery Skin!
--------

replies.body:
What a final! What an effort by all teams. Congratz to North.

Thanks to all who tuned in!
